refnamediv.refpurpose: Make an XPath query on a XML document

listitem.para: xmlDoc, a XML mlist typed XMLDoc
namespaces, an optional matrix nx2 of strings

refsection.title: Description
refsection.para: Make an XPath query on a document. If you need to use namespaces, then you must define them in using the optional argument.
For more informations about XPath, you can read the W3C recommandation.
